thread.section_title: Muscle Meals Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Muscle Meals Direct | musclemealsdirect.com.au
thread.title: Stuart
thread.title_full: Muscle Meals Direct reviewed by Stuart

author: Stuart
title: Stuart
text: Good quality food that is nutritious, filling and easy. The best part is the portion sizes. My wife gets the smaller meals and I get the larger ones. I've had tastier pre prepared meals elsewhere but the quantity and price is great here. I would have given 5 stars but the amount of plastic that the meals come in is sad.
